review: I love it and think I am getting rid of cable.  I bought one for my son's room and one for our room.  I was able to place parental locks on my son's without having the same on the one in our room.  I also enjoy that it is easy enough to move from one room to the other if need be.  We can watch both at the same time and not have any lag time.  I also enjoy the phone app which lets you use your phone as a remote control.  I also enjoy the trivia games which let you have multi-players and is fun if you have guests over.  I have Amazon Prime and Netflix between those two I never run out of things to watch.  Don't think about it just buy it already.  You will not regret it.

author: Mr. Z

review: I bought two of the Amazon Fire Sticks and I have been using them since the day i received the package. They were very easy to set up. My 49 year old dad who is not very familiar with technology was able to easily set one up and I set the other one up.  The instructions walk you right through the setup process and it only takes about 5 minutes. I have Amazon Prime as well as Hulu Plus and Netflix. We use all of these features on the Fire Stick.  Everything is so simple and straightforward my whole family can navigate and use the Fire Stick with no problems, including my 7 year old brother. The only problem we have had is at times it has unexpectedly quit working and a message pops up saying "Unable to connect to Amazon services. Please check internet services and try again later.", even thought our Internet services seemed to be working fine. When this has happened we unplug the Stick from the power source and let it cool down because it gets a little warm and then after an hour or so it seems to work fine. This has been the only problem and overall we are very satisfied with the Fire Stick and would recommend it to anyone who needs streaming services on their TV.
